title: Questions: Food & Drink (Usefulness 5-10)
description: Traveler usefulness 5-10/10 phrases for the Food & Drink subcategory within Questions. Includes 3 card(s).

cards.english: What would you like to drink?
Would you like tea or coffee?
cards.romaji: Kocha ga ii desu ka, aruiwa kohi ga ii desu ka.
cards.japanese: 紅茶がいいですか、あるいはコーヒーがいいですか。
